title: OceanFirst Bank Implements nCino’s Technology for Commercial Loan Processing
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 4:40 AM   nCino 
WILMINGTON, N.C. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- nCino, the leader in cloud banking, announced today that OceanFirst Bank has implemented its Bank Operating System to be utilized for commercial loan processing and approval. This will enhance the internal technology available to the OceanFirst commercial lending division, an area that is already experiencing double-digit growth. 
The $2.5 billion New Jersey institution has a seasoned commercial lending team providing a range of financial solutions including construction loans, commercial mortgages and lines of credit to support businesses’ cash flow and working capital needs. With nCino’s Bank Operating System , OceanFirst has added a comprehensive, secure platform to run alongside its existing core processing system that combines customer relationship management (CRM), business process management, enterprise content management, and business intelligence and reporting. nCino helps automate and simplify the entire lending process, enabling open, transparent communication to happen around each loan file throughout its lifecycle. 
“With nCino’s system, OceanFirst has been able to enhance the technology for underwriting and maintaining customer relationships generated by our commercial lending division,” said Joseph J. Lebel, OceanFirst Bank Executive Vice President and Chief Lending Officer. “We are pleased to have nCino as a strong partner to provide system solutions to effectively support our growth.” 
“In today’s banking environment, how financial institutions operate, store data and deliver customer value and service is continually evolving,” said Josh Glover, senior vice president of community and regional financial institutions at nCino. “Innovative institutions like OceanFirst are at the forefront of implementing new solutions for age-old processes. By adopting nCino’s Bank Operating System, they are discovering firsthand the benefits of the most current technology - from enhanced data security and operational efficiency to increased time savings - which ultimately allows them to focus their attention on serving their customers.” 
About nCino 
nCino is the leader in cloud-based operating solutions for the financial services industry. Through its Bank Operating System , nCino leverages the power and security of the Salesforce platform to deliver a complete banking solution. Dedicated to transforming financial services through innovation, reputation and speed, nCino’s technology enables financial institutions of all sizes to expand market share, adapt to meet regulatory compliance, drive profitability and optimize operational transparency. Founded in 2012, nCino is headquartered in Wilmington, N.C. For more information, visit www.ncino.com and follow us on Twitter: @nCino .
